io.sphere.sdk.client.retry

Class RetryableSphereClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • io.sphere.sdk.client.retry.RetryableSphereClientBuilder

  • public final class RetryableSphereClientBuilder
extends Base
    To create a Sphere Client with retry logic which computes a exponential backoff time delay in milliseconds. And handle all the configurations for the creation of client.

      • withInitialDelay

        public RetryableSphereClientBuilder withInitialDelay(long initialDelay)
        Sets the initialDelay value in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        initialDelay - - build with initialDelay value. If initialDelay is equal or greater than maxDelay then, a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        RetryableSphereClientBuilder with given initialDelay value.

      • withMaxRetryAttempt

        public RetryableSphereClientBuilder withMaxRetryAttempt(int maxRetryAttempt)
        Sets the Max Retry value, It should be greater than 1 for the Retry attempt.
        Parameters:
        maxRetryAttempt - - build with maxRetries value. If maxRetryAttempt is less than 1 then, a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        RetryableSphereClientBuilder with given maxRetries value.

      • withMaxParallelRequests

        public RetryableSphereClientBuilder withMaxParallelRequests(int maxParallelRequests)
        Sets the Max Parallel Requests value, It should be always positive number.
        Parameters:
        maxParallelRequests - - build with maxParallelRequests value. If maxParallelRequests is less than 1 then, a IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        RetryableSphereClientBuilder with given maxParallelRequests value.

        public RetryableSphereClientBuilder withStatusCodesToRetry(List<Integer> statusCodesToRetry)

        Parameters:
        statusCodesToRetry - - build with retryErrorStatusCodes.
        Returns:
        RetryableSphereClientBuilder with given retryErrorStatusCodes.
